subject: Hockey, Ice
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Claude Giroux, Jakub Voracek, and Max Talbot scored in a 3-2 victory that began with Philadelphia retiring the former defenseman Mark Howe’s No. 2.
snippet: Claude Giroux, Jakub Voracek, and Max Talbot scored in a 3-2 victory that began with Philadelphia retiring the former defenseman Mark Howe’s No. 2.
